article_text:
Giant Eagle

Reader Score: 72

Location: Pennsylvania, Ohio, West Virginia, Indiana, Maryland

Year Founded: 1918

This chain received mediocre scores in most categories and a poor score on local produce quality and price satisfaction. Earlier this month, the chain recalled 38 food products with undeclared allergens, which likely won’t help its reputation.
article_summary:
Earlier this month, the chain recalled 38 food products with undeclared allergens, which likely won’t help its reputation.
